column4: So if I want to reinstall Ubuntu over Windows can I just delete windows with rm -rf / -no-preserve-root ?
How do i do that in XP?
I haven't used Linux since Corel Linux. so I forgot a bit.
So is there a Linux like Corel Linux?
Corel Linux  stopped being made years ago
the command you gave would delete / in a Linux distro and result in it being rather well messed up.
you can delete WIndows using the Ubuntu installer,  or  the gparted partition editor on the CD
Unix/Linux is better than Windows for commands
people tend to just use the default in Ubuntu
also useually more advanced Desktop Linux users don't use Ubuntu at all,  because they are using other distro/s instead,  or  they use other distros and Ubuntu
many commands are  for loads of distro's some commands like sudo apt-get install programname are only for  Debian and Debian based distros such as Ubuntu
or well distros based on Ubuntu,  well other distros don't tend to use sudo
maybe you want a re cap on commands or something so
also you seem like the kind of person that will want to know about http://www.distrowatch.com if you don't already know about it
